TextView.android:text: Islamic inheritance being a very important and critical aspect in Islamic society faces a great problem with its calculation due to the manual method used by Islamic scholars. This manual method of distribution was characterized by many problems; some of which are: computational complexity, lack of speed and accuracy, under-splitting and over-splitting, etc. \n\nTherefore, we decided to create an automated Islamic Inheritance Calculator to reduce time consumption and solve other problems encountered in the manual method.
